headline: UK High Court Rules in Favor of Alvotech Paving Way for Manufacture and Market Entry of AVT06, biosimilar to Eylea® (aflibercept)
summary: REYKJAVIK, Iceland, Nov. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Alvotech (NASDAQ: ALVO), a global biotech company specializing in the development and manufacture of biosimilar medicines for patients worldwide, announced today the outcome of expedited infringement proceedings before the UK High Court by Regeneron Pharmaceuticals Inc. (“Regeneron”) and Bayer AG (“Bayer”) against Alvotech and its contract manufacturing organization (CMO) in the United Kingdom. The court rejected Regeneron’s and Bayer’s injun
